Description: System technically capable of automatically recording of events (logs).
Implementation Details: ComplianceLogger class with @log_interaction decorator auto-captures all AI interactions.

Description: Ensuring a level of traceability appropriate to the intended purpose.
Implementation Details: SHA-256 hashing of inputs/outputs with unique UUIDs for each log entry.

Description: Recording of events over the lifetime of the system.
Implementation Details: Persistent CSV storage with Excel consolidation for long-term retention.

Description: Ability to identify situations resulting in Article 79(1) risks.
Implementation Details: AI Watchdog monitors latency (>5s) and DOS attacks (>10 calls/sec) in real-time.

Description: Ability to identify situations presenting substantial modifications.
Implementation Details: System version tracking in every log entry enables modification detection.

Description: Facilitating monitoring of operations (Art 26(5)) and post-market (Art 72).
Implementation Details: AI Auditor generates compliance reports using Gemini LLM for pattern analysis.
